flavorText:
Beneath bright blossoms
Verdant with spring's rich bounty,
The soul blooms in song.

foreignData.flavorText:
Unter hellen Blüten,
inmitten von üppigem Grün,
erblüht die Seele.
foreignData.name: Heiligtum der reichen Ernte
foreignData.text: Zu Beginn deiner Hauptphase vor dem Kampf erzeugst du X Mana genau einer beliebigen Farbe, wobei X gleich der Anzahl an Schreinen ist, die du kontrollierst.

foreignData.flavorText:
Las flores vivas,
verdes en primavera,
florecen almas.
foreignData.name: Santuario de la cosecha provechosa
foreignData.text: Al comienzo de tu fase principal precombate, agrega X manás de un color cualquiera, donde X es la cantidad de Altares que controlas.

foreignData.flavorText:
Sous de belles fleurs
Étincelantes au printemps,
L'âme s'épanouit.
foreignData.name: Sanctuaire des récoltes abondantes
foreignData.text: Au début de votre première phase principale, ajoutez X manas de la couleur de votre choix, X étant le nombre de reliquaires que vous contrôlez.

foreignData.flavorText:
All'ombra di vivaci alberi in fiore,
avvolta dalla generosità della natura,
l'anima sboccia in una soave melodia.
foreignData.name: Santuario del Raccolto Fruttuoso
foreignData.text: All'inizio della tua fase principale pre-combattimento, aggiungi X mana di un qualsiasi colore, dove X è il numero di Santuari che controlli.

foreignData.flavorText:
花の下
新緑唄う
御魂かな
foreignData.name: 豊かな実りの聖域
foreignData.text: あなたの戦闘前メイン・フェイズの開始時に、好きな色１色のマナＸ点を加える。Ｘはあなたがコントロールしている祭殿の総数に等しい。
foreignData.type: 伝説のエンチャント — 祭殿

foreignData.flavorText:
봄의 풍요로운 보상으로 가득한
밝은 꽃 아래에서,
영혼은 노래로 꽃을 피운다.
foreignData.name: 풍성한 수확의 성소
foreignData.text: 당신의 전투전 본단계 시작에, 원하는 한 가지 색 마나 X개를 추가한다. X는 당신이 조종하는 성지의 수이다.

foreignData.flavorText:
À sombra de lindas flores
Viçosas na rica dádiva da primavera,
A alma desabrocha em música.
foreignData.name: Santuário da Colheita Frutífera
foreignData.text: No início de sua fase principal pré-combate, adicione X manas de uma cor à sua escolha, sendo X o número de Sacrários que você controla.

foreignData.flavorText:
Яркие цветы,
Щедрый дар весны, душу
Заставляют петь.
foreignData.name: Святилище Щедрого Урожая
foreignData.text: В начале вашей предбоевой главной фазы добавьте X маны любого одного цвета, где X — количество Святынь под вашим контролем.

foreignData.flavorText:
满园春色中，
百花竞艳生机浓，
魂灵齐声颂。
foreignData.name: 丰收圣殿
foreignData.text: 在你的战斗前的行动阶段开始时，加X点任意颜色的单色法术力，X为由你操控的祭祠数量。

foreignData.flavorText:
滿園春色中，
百花競艷生機濃，
魂靈齊聲頌。
foreignData.name: 豐收聖殿
foreignData.text: 在你的戰鬥前的行動階段開始時，加X點任意顏色的單色魔法力，X為由你操控的祭祠數量。

name: Sanctum of Fruitful Harvest
originalText: At the beginning of your precombat main phase, add X mana of any one color, where X is the number of Shrines you control.

rulings.text: Each Shrine has an ability that counts the number of Shrines you control. These abilities include the Shrine they're printed on.
Shrines count only enchantments with the subtype Shrine. Other cards with “shrine” in their name (such as Jungle Shrine, Luxa River Shrine, and Nantuko Shrine) don't count.

text: At the beginning of your precombat main phase, add X mana of any one color, where X is the number of Shrines you control.
